Item.Name: HostDeviceInfo
Item.Description: This LWM2M Object provides a range of host device related information which can be queried by the LWM2M Server. The host device is any integrated device with an embedded cellular radio module.

Item.Name: HostDeviceInfo
Item.Description: This LWM2M Object provides a range of host device related information which can be queried by the LWM2M Server. The host device is any integrated device with an embedded cellular radio module.
